question.text: A point object is placed at distance of $20 \mathrm{~cm}$ from a thin planoconvex lens of focal length $15 \mathrm{~cm}$. The plane surface of the lens is now silvered. The image created by the system is at

options.text: $60 \mathrm{~cm}$ to the left of the system
$60 \mathrm{~cm}$ to the right of the system
$12 \mathrm{~cm}$ to the left of the system
$12 \mathrm{~cm}$ to the right of the system
